DWFCore::DWFCoreMemory

DWFCore::DWFCoreMemory Class Reference

#include "dwfcore/Core.h"

Inheritance diagram for DWFCore::DWFCoreMemory:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Base class for all core library objects.

Since:
1.0.1
Warning:
Do not derive abstract interfaces from this base.
If configured with the DWFCORE_ENABLE_MEMORY_BASE macro, new() and delete() operators are defined for every concrete class in library. Their implementation may be customized or the global operators can be automatically provided by also defining the DWFCORE_USE_DEFAULT_MEMORY_BASE_IMPL macro.
